|rad1chip2 = |rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM SerComm (YGH00E-1.0) This device shares the same SerComm board ID as the [[Belkin F5D7230-4 v8]]. It probably uses BCM5354 and the specs may otherwise be identical.
Per the manual, the default SSID is '''Dynex'''. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.dynexproducts.com/products/computer-accessories/DX-WEGRTR.html?supportTab=open Support page]
[http://www.dynexproducts.com/cms/documents/07-366%20DX-WEGRTR%20combined%20-%20WEB.pdf Manual]
